title: Chistorra
directions: Preparation Chop the meat properly refrigerated in the grinder with grid 8. Add seasoning and knead well. Let stand 24 hours in refrigerator. Mortise in gut lamb 22/24 and provide by strings. Orear leave at room temperature for 1 hour and then dried at 12 Â° C with a relative humidity around 76%. The drying time is usually short, two or three days, since this sausage cured even quite cool and is consumed mostly fried. NOTE: There are prepared in the complete market for flavoring all kinds of sausages, with which, following the manufacturer's instructions regarding amount of preparation per kg. mass, good results and with all the guarantees are achieved.
